{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0.9999999... is an infinite sum : 0.9+0.09+0.009+..."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This sum has a finite limit, which is 1."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: (1) - Outcoming.

If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\widehat{\\text{BCD}} = 2\\widehat{\\text{EAD}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then what is the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\displaystyle \\frac{\\text{CD}}{\\text{AB}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}
